Text: Doesn't work for me! :( Gets an error about unknown format and that it is damaged...
When extracting? Update your extractor to something that supports LZMA2. Recent 7-Zip and WinRAR are fine.

Ok sorry Majin3, you were right. I was using an older version of WinRAR. Just updated it and I could extract the file. Now played a few minutes and everything seemed to work fine. So don't pay attention to my previous post, it actually is a great upload!
I was playing for like a hour now, yet I recognize an new problem. The game freezes (black screen) when I want to enter Verdant Court in the Arbor Area.. Any solution?
hi majin3 thanks for the upload,when i load the game after i start new one my emulator always  crushes ,do you know how to fix this thanks agin

Raikkonen94: Hmm, not for now. I actually didn't test it at all, so a bug is possible. Try to use the normal release to get past that scene and see if it works again.

erekevan: Update Dolphin.
Majin3: with "try to use the normal release" you mean I have to buy the game in real or do you mean something else?

Raikkonen94: You're asking me on The Pirate Bay if I meant to buy it? lol
This one: PokePark.2.Wonders.Beyond.PAL.WII-SUSHi
If it freezes on this one as well, there's something wrong on your end.
I downloaded that version. It worked perfectly without any bugs. So it's clearly this version that doesn't work.
Raikkonen94: I see. Not sure what could cause a crash, but if I ever get to play this I'll fix it sometime. Thanks for the report.

Hi, can anyone help me?
How do I play downloaded games on my wii?
I have got as far as downloading the game, putting it onto an SD card and putting it into the front of the console.
What software do I need to boot the games?
Thanks for your time

i have tried to extract the file using winrar, after that i got an .iso file which i am kind of unable to run on poweriso or any other image mounting software. The files inside the .iso are not visible in poweriso . Any solution ?
